txt.en: The Isles: Bruidis and Rossaran
Talk to Bruidis by the Wave-hunter on the Shield Isles

'Many of the sailors who crewed the Wave-hunter sustained injuries during the storm, and Bruidis wants to prepare a salve that will help make them more comfortable while they recover. She has set me to fish, for apparently this salve has need of fish-scales, but there are other ingredients to be gathered. Speak to her and she will tell you what else she needs, if you are of a mind to help.'
The fish scales join everything else in the tub. Is the salve complete?
Talk to Bruidis by the Wave-hunter on the Shield Isles

'Rossaran has enlisted you to help me gather the ingredients I need to brew the salve? He is a good man, my husband. But you would have offered to help me anyway, would you not? I think I am a good judge of character, not just of husbands but of friends, as well.\n\n'This salve requires herbs tough enough to grow on the nearby beach, flowers nourished by the damp air blanketing this isle, and several pieces of tree-bark, which you should be able to take from a large grey tree I saw to the west. Bring these ingredients back to me and I will tell you about the next steps.'
Collect scraggly herbs from the nearby beach ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'My wife Bruidis wants to prepare a salve that will ease the sailors' recovery. She has set me to fish, for apparently this salve has need of fish-scales, but there are other ingredients to be gathered. Speak to her and she will tell you what else she needs, if you are of a mind to help.'

'This salve requires herbs tough enough to grow on the nearby beach, flowers nourished by the damp air blanketing this isle, and several pieces of tree-bark, which you should be able to take from a large grey tree I saw to the west. Bring these ingredients back to me and I will tell you about the next steps.'
Collect wild-flowers from the isle near Voyage's End ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'You found the things I need! I am very pleased to hear it, [placeholder]!\n\n'Now you need to steep each of the ingredients in the tub of water I have prepared to the south-east: the herbs the longest, followed by the flowers, and finally the tree-bark. After you have added each of these things to the water, speak to Rossaran and obtain as many fish-scales as he can give you, and add those to the tub last of all.'

Collected scraggly herbs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'All done? Very good, and thank you!

'The salve will take awhile to steep, but once it is prepared I will have Rossaran bring it around to the injured sailors. You have done more than enough, and we appreciate every bit of it! But do not let me distract you any further... there is surely work to be done elsewhere on the Shield Isles, and I know the Lady Nauriel wants nothing to delay the rescue of her son from the Kindred of the Coins!

'But I know a thing or two about such things, and we will want the members of the crew to be as rested and comfortable as they can be when the time comes to mount the rescue. Injured men fight poorly, no matter how brave they may be when hale, or during peacetime.

'Thank you once again, [placeholder]. We will not forget that you helped us... all of us!'
